perturbation.original_text: CISCO SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR LOSS, DAMAGE OR PENALTY FOR DELAY IN DELIVERY OR FOR FAILURE TO GIVE NOTICE OF ANY DELAY. EXCEPT IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE APPLICABLE DELIVERY TERMS SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT, CISCO SHALL NOT HAVE ANY LIABILITY IN CONNECTION WITH SHIPMENT, NOR SHALL THE CARRIER BE DEEMED TO BE AN AGENT OF CISCO.
perturbation.changed_text: CISCO SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR LOSS, DAMAGE OR PENALTY FOR DELAY IN DELIVERY OR FOR FAILURE TO GIVE NOTICE OF ANY DELAY. CISCO SHALL NOT HAVE ANY LIABILITY IN CONNECTION WITH SHIPMENT, NOR SHALL THE CARRIER BE DEEMED TO BE AN AGENT OF CISCO. EXCEPT IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE APPLICABLE DELIVERY TERMS SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT.
perturbation.explanation: Relocated the phrase that Cisco is not responsible with shipping arrangements to disrupt the section.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Typical commercial law regarding liability in shipping contracts.

perturbation.original_text: The validity, interpretation, and performance of this Agreement shall be controlled by and construed under the laws of the State of New York, United States of America, as if performed wholly within the state and without giving effect to the principles of conflicts of law, and the state and federal courts of California shall have jurisdiction over any claim arising under this Agreement. The parties specifically disclaim the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods. Notwithstanding the foregoing, either party may seek interim injunctive relief in any court of appropriate jurisdiction with respect to any alleged breach of such party's intellectual property or proprietary rights.
perturbation.changed_text: The validity, interpretation, and performance of this Agreement shall be controlled by and construed under the laws of the State of New York, United States of America, as if performed wholly within the state and without giving effect to the principles of conflicts of law. The parties specifically disclaim the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods. Notwithstanding the foregoing, either party may seek interim injunctive relief in any court of appropriate jurisdiction with respect to any alleged breach of such party's intellectual property or proprietary rights, and the state and federal courts of California shall have jurisdiction over any claim arising under this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Moved where jurisdiction takes place within the agreement. It reduces the clarity of where the governing law will be enforced.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract law principles requiring clear jurisdiction clauses.

perturbation.original_text: Service contracts that have not been renewed or have lapsed after 12 months of end-of​ sale date are not re-newable.
perturbation.changed_text: Service contracts that have not been renewed or have lapsed after 12 months of end-of​ sale date may be re-newable at Cisco's discretion.
perturbation.explanation: Adding a clause that the service agreements might be renewable at Cisco's discretion goes against what was previously said.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract law pertaining to clarity and consistency in terms.
